tool_description: Get real-time prices for commonly-traded commodities
name: Commodity Price by API-Ninjas
title: Commodity Price by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/commodityprice
api_list.description: API Ninjas Commodity Price API endpoint. Returns the current price information for a given commodity name.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of commodity. Possible values can be found at https://api-ninjas.com/api/commodityprice
